name: bus_trolley_schedules
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool septa.
Tool description: Provides hackathon-style access to the SEPTA API.

Allows introspection of the SEPTA locations and routes, and provides basically-realtime data on delays, alerts, vehicles, and routes.
API description: Fetches bus or trolley schedules based on the provided parameters from the SEPTA API.

req1.description: The stop ID for which the schedule is being requested.

req3.description: 'i' for inbound or 'o' for outbound. Defaults to 'i'.

req6.description: The number of results to return. Defaults to 7.
